page.title: 06Clubs
page.content:
{Drax Social Club } Situated in Barlow Village, this club was initially for employees of the CEGB, but others can now join. It has games and bar facilities and holds evening and weekend social events.
{B.M.X.Club } B.M.X. - meaning British Motor Cross - is a type of two wheeled bicycle which is becoming more and more popular with youngsters. The B.M.X. Club with aid from the local district council has established a specially constructed track with hillocks, bridges and corners over which races are held. Membership of the club is Â£2.00 and entry into a race costs Â£1.00.
